item.title: Uniting Words
item.description: As a part of a workshop on Design Activism, I created a branding system for Uniting Words, an organization that promotes literacy through community storytelling initiatives. The colors, typefaces, and aesthetic convey approachableness and warmth, much like the experience of connecting with a great book or story. There are mockups for a brand activation event that outline ideas for extending the organization’s reach through community outreach.
